title: Topic 002 Question 118
body: You have a Microsoft Entra tenant named contoso.com.
You have a partner company that has a Microsoft Entra tenant named fabrikam.com.

You need to ensure that when a user in fabrikam.com attempts to access the resources in contoso.com, the user only receives a single Microsoft Entra Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) prompt. The solution must minimize administrative effort.
options: From the Azure portal of contoso.com, configure the inbound access default settings.
From the Azure portal of contoso.com, configure the External collaboration settings.
From the Azure portal of contoso.com, configure the outbound access default settings.
From the Azure portal of fabrikam.com, configure the outbound access default settings.
